#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define bitcnt __builtin_popcount
#define ln length()
#define rep(i, n) for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
#define all(a)  a.begin(),a.end()
#define MAX 1005

int arr[MAX];

void solve()
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d", &n);
	for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		scanf("%d", &arr[i]);
	}
	sort(arr, arr + n);		
	int p = 0, q = 0;
	for(int i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
		if(p <= q) {
			p += arr[i];
		}
		else {
			q += arr[i];
		}
	}
	printf("%d\n", abs(p - q));
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--) {
		solve();
	}
	return 0;
}
